title: Trouble on Tatooine: constructing a plausible fantasy food web

abstract.Purpose: A half-baked experiemnt on trying to construct a food web for Tatooine using real world data.
abstract.Motivation: I'm going through a Star Wars moment™.
abstract.Conceptally: What if we're dealing with realy poor data coveragw for a location can we still salvage *something*
abstract.Plan: Take a species list for Tatooine, assign some traits and use that as the transfer medium from real-world trait and interaction data.
abstract.Outcome?: Maybe we can also identify some missing species based on trophic levels/links are missing
abstract.Challenges: What to treat as a complete species list for Tatooine, reconciling the fact that species were developed based on 'narrative need' as opposed to 'ecologcal need
